markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boneyard's Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=1376) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a powerful connection to the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15) and its courts, granting you the ability to travel to and from the Boneyard. You gain [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) as a divine innate spell. You can cast it twice per week. This can be used only to travel to the Boneyard or from the Boneyard to the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1). Due to your unique connection to the Boneyard, your body serves as the focus, and you don't require a tuning fork.
name: Boneyard's Call
